title.rendered: Piles and Piles and Piles of Books!

content.rendered: Keep bringing your books for store credit! All Gottwals Books locations are being flooded with new inventory, so make a trip weekly (or daily!) for all the new options. You never know what we’ll get… more books are hitting the shelf all day, every day.

excerpt.rendered: Keep bringing your books for store credit! All Gottwals Books locations are being flooded with new inventory, so make a trip weekly (or daily!) for all the new options. You never know what we’ll get… more books are hitting the shelf all day, every day.
